titleStmt.title: A treatise of the passions and faculties of the soule of man With the severall dignities and corruptions thereunto belonging. By Edvvard Reynoldes, late preacher to the honorable society of Lincoln's Inne: and now rector of the Church of Braunston in Northamptonshire.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

titleStmt.title: A treatise of the passions and faculties of the soule of man With the severall dignities and corruptions thereunto belonging. By Edvvard Reynoldes, late preacher to the honorable society of Lincoln's Inne: and now rector of the Church of Braunston in Northamptonshire.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. H[earne and John Norton] for Robert Bostock, dwelling in Saint Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings Head,

notesStmt.note: Quires 3A-3K printed by Norton; Hearne printed the rest (STC addendum).
Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: A⁴ (a)⁴ b⁴ [-b4] B-2X⁴ 2Y² 3A-3I⁴ 3K² 3L-3T⁴ [3V]1 [3X]1.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
